title: Beheaded King Charles cartoon after 'you are not my king' protest: Major row in Australia, post deleted
content: Australian senator Lidia Thorpe shared a cartoon of beheaded King Charles on her Instagram story after protesting his parliament speech. Facing flak, she deleted the story and posted a clarification that it was shared without her knowledge. "Earlier tonight, without my knowledge, one of my staff shared an image to my Instagram stories created by another account, I deleted it as soon as I saw. I would not intentionally share anything that could be seen to encourage violence against anyone. That's not what I'm about," she posted.​​
summary: Australian senator Lidia Thorpe shared a cartoon of beheaded King Charles on her Instagram story after protesting his parliament speech. Facing flak, she deleted the story and posted a clarification that it was shared without her knowledge. "Earlier tonight, without my knowledge, one of my staff shared an image to my Instagram stories created by another account, I deleted it as soon as I saw. I would not intentionally share anything that could be seen to encourage violence against anyone. That's not what I'm about," she posted.​​

title: 'No copy of Sheikh Hasina's resignation letter': Bangladesh president recounts mayhem of August 5
content: President Mohammed Shahabuddin revealed the absence of documented evidence of Sheikh Hasina's resignation amidst chaos on August 5. Although Shahabuddin and the army chief heard of her departure, no formal resignation was found. Hasina's son clarified she never officially resigned due to the sudden unrest, leaving her technically in office.
summary: President Mohammed Shahabuddin revealed the absence of documented evidence of Sheikh Hasina's resignation amidst chaos on August 5. Although Shahabuddin and the army chief heard of her departure, no formal resignation was found. Hasina's son clarified she never officially resigned due to the sudden unrest, leaving her technically in office.

title: Two celebrities named on Diddy list, accused of assaulting 13-year-old
content: The complainant of the latest lawsuit alleged that she was offered a strange, fruity drink after which she felt drowsy. She went to lie down in a bedroom. Combs and a male and a female, both reportedly famous, came into the room. "You are ready to party," Combs told her, according to the complaint.

title: McDonald’s tells workers it doesn’t endorse political candidates after Trump visit
content: McDonald's maintains neutrality in the presidential election, stating it doesn't endorse candidates. Despite Trump's visit to a Pennsylvania location and cooking there, the company emphasises its open-door policy. They've also invited Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, underscoring their non-partisan stance.
summary: McDonald's maintains neutrality in the presidential election, stating it doesn't endorse candidates. Despite Trump's visit to a Pennsylvania location and cooking there, the company emphasises its open-door policy. They've also invited Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, underscoring their non-partisan stance.

title: Donald Trump's McDonald's gig was staged? Outlet was closed for the day?
content: An unverified notice sparked speculations that the entire event of Donald Trump working at a McDonald's in Pennsylvania was staged, with closed doors and vetted customers. The Washington Post reported that the restaurant was closed and the customer whom Trump served were screened by the Secret Service and positioned before his arrival making it clear that they did not by chance arrived and was gobsmacked to see Donald Trump handing them their fries -- they were well prepared.
summary: An unverified notice sparked speculations that the entire event of Donald Trump working at a McDonald's in Pennsylvania was staged, with closed doors and vetted customers. The Washington Post reported that the restaurant was closed and the customer whom Trump served were screened by the Secret Service and positioned before his arrival making it clear that they did not by chance arrived and was gobsmacked to see Donald Trump handing them their fries -- they were well prepared.

title: Is Election Day 2024 a federal holiday? All you need to know
content: Election Day is not a federal holiday but some states observe it as a holiday. State offices will be closed on November 5 in Delaware, Hawaii, Illinois, Indiana, Louisiana, Maryland, Michigan, Montana, New Jersey, New York, Rhode Island, Virginia, West Virginia. 24 state and the district of Columbia offer paid time off to vote.
summary: Election Day is not a federal holiday but some states observe it as a holiday. State offices will be closed on November 5 in Delaware, Hawaii, Illinois, Indiana, Louisiana, Maryland, Michigan, Montana, New Jersey, New York, Rhode Island, Virginia, West Virginia. 24 state and the district of Columbia offer paid time off to vote.

title: 'They have our skulls': Why Australia senator Lidia Thorpe heckled King Charles
content: King Charles faced a verbal attack by indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe during his Australian parliament speech as the senator called him to return indigenous remains and land. Explaining her action, Thorpe told Sky News that Charles should answer for the thousands of massacre sited in Australia. "We have our bones and our skulls still in his possession -- or in his family's possession. We want that back," the senator said.
summary: King Charles faced a verbal attack by indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe during his Australian parliament speech as the senator called him to return indigenous remains and land. Explaining her action, Thorpe told Sky News that Charles should answer for the thousands of massacre sited in Australia. "We have our bones and our skulls still in his possession -- or in his family's possession. We want that back," the senator said.

title: Fethullah Gülen dies at 83: Who was self-exiled spiritual leader accused of Trukish coup attempt in 2016
content: Fethullah Gulen, the Islamic leader accused by Turkey of masterminding the 2016 coup attempt, has died at 83. Gulen's Hizmet movement was influential globally in education and media before falling out with Erdogan in 2013. Post-coup, Turkey prosecuted numerous followers, while Gulen remained in the U.S., resisting extradition.
summary: Fethullah Gulen, the Islamic leader accused by Turkey of masterminding the 2016 coup attempt, has died at 83. Gulen's Hizmet movement was influential globally in education and media before falling out with Erdogan in 2013. Post-coup, Turkey prosecuted numerous followers, while Gulen remained in the U.S., resisting extradition.

title: 'Stunning security failures of Secret Service led to Trump assassination bid': House panel's scathing report
content: A House panel report has determined that the assassination attempt on former President Trump at a Pennsylvania rally was "preventable" due to significant security failures. It noted that law enforcement could have engaged the suspect, Thomas Matthew Crooks, at several critical moments but failed to communicate effectively. The report reiterates previous findings about the Secret Service's shortcomings and does not identify specific individuals responsible. Meanwhile, an investigation is underway into a second assassination attempt involving a man with a rifle outside one of Trump's golf courses in Florida.
summary: A House panel report has determined that the assassination attempt on former President Trump at a Pennsylvania rally was "preventable" due to significant security failures. It noted that law enforcement could have engaged the suspect, Thomas Matthew Crooks, at several critical moments but failed to communicate effectively. The report reiterates previous findings about the Secret Service's shortcomings and does not identify specific individuals responsible. Meanwhile, an investigation is underway into a second assassination attempt involving a man with a rifle outside one of Trump's golf courses in Florida.

title: Pakistan allocates Rs 10 million for restoration of historic Hindu Temple in Punjab
US Election 2024: Trump has 52% chance of winning, shows poll
content: Donald Trump, Republican presidential candidate, leads Democratic nominee Kamala Harris in the Decision Desk HQ/The Hill election forecast with a 52% chance to win the presidency. This shift reflects Trump's stronger polling in key battleground states, now narrowing Harris's earlier lead.
summary: Donald Trump, Republican presidential candidate, leads Democratic nominee Kamala Harris in the Decision Desk HQ/The Hill election forecast with a 52% chance to win the presidency. This shift reflects Trump's stronger polling in key battleground states, now narrowing Harris's earlier lead.

title: From bustling streets to silence: Beirut’s transformation after Israeli strikes
Will Elon Musk run for President? What the Tesla CEO said
content: Elon Musk clarified he has no interest in running for US president due to his African birthplace and preference for technology over politics. Despite his support for Donald Trump and commitment to work on government efficiency, Musk's focus remains on advancing space exploration and electric vehicles.
summary: Elon Musk clarified he has no interest in running for US president due to his African birthplace and preference for technology over politics. Despite his support for Donald Trump and commitment to work on government efficiency, Musk's focus remains on advancing space exploration and electric vehicles.

title: 'Ready for it, Cat lady?': Trump fans fly huge banner over Taylor Swift's Miami concert
content: A Trump supporter flew a banner over Hard Rock Stadium during Taylor Swift’s concert, referencing her past political endorsements. The banner read 'Trump 2024 - Ready For It, Cat Lady? MAGA!' Swift had previously endorsed Kamala Harris for the 2024 election, advocating for calm leadership. Local Democrats aimed to boost voter support through Swift’s influence.
summary: A Trump supporter flew a banner over Hard Rock Stadium during Taylor Swift’s concert, referencing her past political endorsements. The banner read 'Trump 2024 - Ready For It, Cat Lady? MAGA!' Swift had previously endorsed Kamala Harris for the 2024 election, advocating for calm leadership. Local Democrats aimed to boost voter support through Swift’s influence.

title: 7 dead, at least 30 missing in Myanmar after boat carrying people who fled fighting capsized
content: Seven confirmed dead and over 30 missing after an overcrowded boat, carrying villagers fleeing from Myanmar conflict, capsized in the Andaman Sea. The boat, intended for 30-40 passengers, was overloaded with 70-75 people and commodities, sinking near Kyauk Kar. Heavy currents and overcrowding are suspected causes.
summary: Seven confirmed dead and over 30 missing after an overcrowded boat, carrying villagers fleeing from Myanmar conflict, capsized in the Andaman Sea. The boat, intended for 30-40 passengers, was overloaded with 70-75 people and commodities, sinking near Kyauk Kar. Heavy currents and overcrowding are suspected causes.

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs faces new sexual assault lawsuits amid growing allegations
content: Rapper Sean "Diddy" Combs faces five new civil lawsuits, accusing him of sexual assault and rape from 2000 to 2022. Plaintiffs include two men and three women, with one woman alleging assault at age 13. Combs is already detained on federal racketeering and sex trafficking charges.
summary: Rapper Sean "Diddy" Combs faces five new civil lawsuits, accusing him of sexual assault and rape from 2000 to 2022. Plaintiffs include two men and three women, with one woman alleging assault at age 13. Combs is already detained on federal racketeering and sex trafficking charges.

title: Pakistan PM Sharif advices President Zardari to sign 26th Constitutional Amendment Bill into law
Orionid meteor shower: When and where to watch the celestial event's peak
content: The Orionid meteor shower, linked to Halley's Comet, peaks from Sunday night into Monday morning with up to 20 meteors per hour. Best viewing is post-midnight, with visibility improved by the waning hunter's moon. The event remains active until November 22.
summary: The Orionid meteor shower, linked to Halley's Comet, peaks from Sunday night into Monday morning with up to 20 meteors per hour. Best viewing is post-midnight, with visibility improved by the waning hunter's moon. The event remains active until November 22.

title: Hurricane Oscar brings heavy rainfall and winds to eastern Cuba after landfall
content: Hurricane Oscar made landfall in eastern Cuba, bringing heavy rainfall, strong winds, and flooding before weakening to a tropical storm. The storm, initially a Category 1 hurricane, prompted warnings of significant flash flooding and mudslides. Cuba is already grappling with its worst blackout in two years, complicating recovery efforts.
summary: Hurricane Oscar made landfall in eastern Cuba, bringing heavy rainfall, strong winds, and flooding before weakening to a tropical storm. The storm, initially a Category 1 hurricane, prompted warnings of significant flash flooding and mudslides. Cuba is already grappling with its worst blackout in two years, complicating recovery efforts.

title: 'Not your punching ball': France protest in solidarity with mass rape victim Gisèle Pelicot
content: Hundreds gathered in Paris and other French cities to support Gisèle Pelicot, whose ex-husband is on trial for drugging and allowing over 50 men to rape her for more than a decade. Her public handling of the case has sparked widespread debate on sexual abuse and the justice system's leniency.
summary: Hundreds gathered in Paris and other French cities to support Gisèle Pelicot, whose ex-husband is on trial for drugging and allowing over 50 men to rape her for more than a decade. Her public handling of the case has sparked widespread debate on sexual abuse and the justice system's leniency.
